sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"学院，大学"之意。
means: college ： 多指大学内的学院，分科学院或科目较少的高等学校。
university ： 主要指综合大学，一般由多个学院组成。当泛指大学时通常用college表示。
institute ： 指设立有专门学科的学院，如外语学院、地质学院、建筑学院等。
school ： 指大学所属的学院或系。
academy ： 指(高等)专科院校或研究专门学术的学校。

entry.def: A school is a place where children are educated. You usually refer to this place as school when you are talking about the time that children spend there and the activities that they do there.

example.ex: ...a boy who was in my class at school...
example.tran: 上学时和我一个班的男孩

example.ex: Even the good students say homework is what they most dislike about school...
example.tran: 就连好学生都说上学最讨厌的就是要写家庭作业。

entry.def: A school is the pupils or staff at a school.

example.ex: Deirdre, the whole school's going to hate you.
example.tran: 戴尔德丽，学校里所有人都会恨你的。

example.ex: ...a children's writing competition open to schools or individuals.
example.tran: 可以以学校或个人名义参加的儿童写作比赛

entry.def: A privately-run place where a particular skill or subject is taught can be referred to as a school .

example.ex: ...a riding school and equestrian centre near Chepstow.
example.tran: 在切普斯托附近的一所骑术学校兼马术中心

entry.def: A university, college, or university department specializing in a particular type of subject can be referred to as a school .

entry.def: School is used to refer to university or college.

example.ex: Moving rapidly through school, he graduated Phi Beta Kappa from the University of Kentucky at age 18.
example.tran: 他连续跳级, 18 岁时就以全美优等生联谊会成员的身份从肯塔基大学毕业。

entry.def: A particular school of writers, artists, or thinkers is a group of them whose work, opinions, or theories are similar.

example.ex: O'Keeffe was influenced by various painters and photographers, but she was never a member of any school.
example.tran: 欧姬芙受多位画家和摄影家的影响，但她从未加入过任何学派。

entry.def: A school of fish or dolphins is a large group of them moving through water together.
If you school someone in something, you train or educate them to have a certain skill, type of behaviour, or way of thinking.

example.ex: Many mothers schooled their daughters in the myth of female inferiority...
example.tran: 许多母亲把男尊女卑的错误观念传给了她们的女儿。

example.ex: He is schooled to spot trouble.
example.tran: 他受过训练，能够迅速发现问题。

entry.def: To school a child means to educate him or her.

example.ex: She's been schooling her kids herself.
example.tran: 她一直在自己教育孩子。

entry.def: If you school a horse, you train it so that it can be ridden in races or competitions.

example.ex: She bought him as a £1,000 colt of six months and schooled him.
example.tran: 在它还是 6 个月的小马驹时，她用 1,000 英镑将它买下，并训练它。

entry.def: If you approve of someone because they have good qualities that used to be more common in the past, you can describe them as one of the old school .

example.ex: He is one of the old school who still believes in honour in public life.
example.tran: 他思想传统，在别人面前仍然讲究体面。

example.ex: ...an elderly gentleman of the old school.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English scōl, scolu, via Latin from Greek skholē 'leisure, philosophy, lecture-place', reinforced in Middle English by Old French escole
late Middle English: from Middle Low German, Middle Dutch schōle, of West Germanic origin; related to Old English scolu 'troop'. Compare with shoal
